Package graphics.ui.controllers

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
graphics.ui.controllers.Controller
graphics.ui.controllers.AbstractController
graphics.ui.controllers.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener
public class GameController extends AbstractController
Définition du controller lié aux jeux.
